synopsis.text: Aines, Lene, Ann, and Strarf are not just any ordinary action figures; they are Busou Shinki, miniature androids with full-sized personalities and emotions, equipped with weapons and armor to serve and protect their master, Masato. After returning to Japan and starting high school, Masato's life becomes anything but ordinary as he navigates the challenges of adolescence with his four tiny, yet fierce, companions by his side. As each Shinki vies for Masato's attention and affection, tensions rise and sparks fly in this slice-of-life battle story set in a future where robots are a common part of everyday life. With a mysterious new Shinki, Strarf, joining the fray, Masato's world is about to get even more interesting. Join Masato and his Shinki on a thrilling and heartwarming adventure in Busou Shinki!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
